mobileAppsData.description: Turn your webOS device into an e-book reader. Read plain-text, HTML, PalmDOC, MobiPocket, eReader, ePub, and Amazon AZW files in portrait or landscape mode.
mobileAppsData.title: pReader

mobileAppsData.description: Avoid spelling mistakes with this easy-to-use dictionary. Just open it and start typing—the app searches as you type. And if you misspell a word, it suggests possible alternatives.
mobileAppsData.title: Dictionary

mobileAppsData.description: Get quick and easy access to reliable drug information with the beta version of Epocrates Rx. Find dosing, check for drug interactions, perform medical calculations, and more.
mobileAppsData.title: Epocrates

mobileAppsData.description: Wish you had an RSS reader for your favorite webcomics? View comics like Garfield, Dilbert, xkcd, and more in full screen right on your device.
mobileAppsData.title: Comics

mobileAppsData.description: Get 60,000 step-by-step how-to articles at your fingertips, including a Survival Kit for life's most challenging situations. Learn how to do everything from perform CPR to escape from a bear.
mobileAppsData.title: wikiHow

mobileAppsData.description: Search Wikipedia using an interface optimized for your Palm webOS phone. Get news headlines, a search history, bookmarks, and more. Email an article with just one touch.
mobileAppsData.title: Infopedia

mobileAppsData.description: Search comprehensive business details, scan ratings, read reviews, get GPS-integrated maps, and connect with millions of local businesses and services right from your phone.
mobileAppsData.title: YPmobile

mobileAppsData.description: Discover thousands of best-selling books, news and magazine articles, short stories, blog posts, and more. Find your next great read on the go.<sup>2</sup>
mobileAppsData.title: Kobo

mobileAppsData.description: Enjoy great literature without having to crack a book. Simply relax and listen to these classics when you're working out, on the go, or just going about your day.
mobileAppsData.title: Audiobook Classics

mobileAppsData.description: Never be at a loss for words with this easy way to search the Wiktionary database. Use it when you need a winning word for Scrabble or you're just trying to win an argument.
mobileAppsData.title: Quiktionary

mobileAppsData.description: Translate single words or full sentences in over 45 languages. This app automatically detects what language a word is in as you type it, making it easy to communicate wherever you are.
mobileAppsData.title: My Translator

mobileAppsData.description: Keep the periodic table of elements handy for instant reference. Designed for physicists, chemists, and students, this app provides easy access to all the details of the periodic table.
mobileAppsData.title: Periodic Table

mobileAppsData.description: Put the entire CIA World Factbook at your fingertips. Research your next vacation or add to your knowledge about the world around us—the app covers every country in the world.
mobileAppsData.title: World Factbook

mobileAppsData.description: Wondering how to say something in French? This collegiate-level dictionary and verb book for students and travelers has thousands of entries, including complete verb conjugations.
mobileAppsData.title: French-English Dictionary

mobileAppsData.description: Know how fast you're going with this GPS-based speedometer. See a continuous display of your velocity whether you're on land, water, or in the air.
mobileAppsData.title: Speed
